rooms.title: Room
rooms.subtitle: Types
rooms.description-luxe-2-1: Two-room suite with all amenities, bathroom and balcony. Wonderful view of the hotel area and mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-junior-suite-1: Junior suite with all amenities, bathroom and balcony overlooking the hotel grounds and mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-standart-1-1: Standard superior, double room with bathroom and balcony overlooking the hotel grounds and mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-economy-1-1: Economy superior with twin beds and a balcony, overlooking the hotel grounds and mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-luxe-3-9: The three-room suite has two bathrooms (showers), a balcony with a magnificent view of the mountains and the area. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-luxe-2-9: Two-room suite with all amenities, bathroom with shower, balcony with a view of the mountains and the area. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-junior-suite-9: Junior suite with all amenities, bathroom with shower, no balcony with a beautiful view of the mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-economy-9: Economy room with twin beds, bathroom with shower, no balcony with a beautiful view of the mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-standart-9-a: Standard with a double bed and a folding chair for a child, a bathroom with a bathtub, a small balcony with a beautiful view of the mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.
rooms.description-economy-9-a: Economy room with a double bed, a bathroom with a bathtub, a small balcony with a beautiful view of the mountains. The room has: TV, refrigerator, air conditioning, hairdryer, kettle (if there is no blackout), and much more for your comfort.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Explore our gallery to see the beauty of the hotel and the surrounding landscapes.

footer.iziToastSuccessMessage: Our employee will call you soon!
